snippet: A video of the encounter has become a new symbol of what many people see as police abuses directed against minorities and the homeless.
abstract: Video of Los Angeles police officers shooting to death homeless man in Skid Row as they tried to arrest him as suspect in robbery has become symbolic of what many people view as police abuses aimed against minorities and homeless; police say he was reaching for weapon; video, taken by bystander, was uploaded to Facebook.

byline.contributor: Ashley Southall contributed reporting from New York, and Noah Smith from Los Angeles.

lead_paragraph: A video of the encounter has become a new symbol of what many people see as police abuses directed against minorities and the homeless.

headline.main: Police Are Criticized for Use of Force in Shooting in Los Angeles’s Skid Row
headline.print_headline: Use of Force Is Criticized in Skid Row Shooting
